page.title: 12Beckingham(Lincs)Post Office
page.content: The Post Office is situated almost in the centre of the village on Sleaford Road and has operated from the same cottage for the last 52 years. The Post Office also includes small general stores which means that most of the villagers visit the office fairly regularly to do business and have a chat. The opening hours are from nine to one and from two until five_thirty with half day closing on Wednesday and Saturday. Most of the services offered by the general town post-offices are available at this post office although it is not possible to issue motor vehicle taxation licences at the present time. The general stores offers a wide range of goods and is much used by those who have difficulty getting to town.
